mapper.select: select course_schedule.courseId, c.courseName, course_schedule.courseDate from course_schedule inner join course c on course_schedule.courseId = c.courseId where c.courseId = #{courseId}

select * from `user` where userName like concat('%',#{userName},'%') and userId like concat('%',#{userId},'%') and gender like concat('%',#{gender},'%') and phoneNumber like concat('%',#{phoneNumber},'%')
and age = #{age}
mapper.update: update `user` set userName=#{userName}, age=#{age}, gender=#{gender}, phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber} where userId = #{userId}
